description: I had it on Windows and I was well surprised to see it here. It's so cool to just install the package and enjoy the same experience as on Windows. No issues discovered so far.
summary: A nice cross platform password manager

description:
I'm using this tool to synchronize all my passwords. I have it on my windows OS, on my smartphone, and now i'm installing it on ubuntu.
It really is a must to have, work as it's supposed, so i recommended all the time to all my friends and who asks me for such kind of application.
summary: Great application. I use it all the time

description: Great application, it's simplicity is what makes it secure. The more features you add to a password manager the more risk you open yourself up to. This sync is a nice to have it also opens doors to vulnerabilities that don't need to be there. Use OS level sync tools like Online Drive sharing and mounting tools to allow your application to sync to many devices on many platforms. Password safe has ports to Android, Linux and MacOS, as well as the native Windows version. Ask yourself do you really want all those extra features at the risk of exposing all your passwords to third parties. Aside from the unlikely even someone brute forced your password safe DB. They chance of key stroke logging is really the only other major risk you face. Think about it.
summary: Great app, been around for a long time has proven itself secure

description: No complaints after a year of use. Simple, elegant, time-tested, portable.
summary: My daily driver for over a year

description: Been using it on my phone for about half a year, no complaints. Decided to bring it to Ubuntu. Doesn't read the Android save. Still a good password manager.
Application starts, but is unussable. Menus are disabled and side menu shows a dropdown but no text (something bugged here)

Have used this for over 12 years in Windows and now grateful to be able to transfer seamlessly to Linux. Much safer being standalone than being attached to a browser or cloud based. Highly recommended.
I love it, its a great free app to encrypt your passwords, thank you developers
summary: its apps like these why I love linux

description: I have been using this for several years now on Ubuntu and like especially the simplicity and straightforwardness of operation. I am never in doubt about what the program is going to do. But I suspect that there are useful improvements that could be made, or at least updates to the user interface. Sure wish the developers would pay some attention to it.
I tried TXT and XML imports but both failed. I don't have time to fight with these things. Deleted.
summary: Says it imports from files but won't

description: Tatsächlich ist das Original immer noch die beste Option und erlaubt das öffnen der Passwort-Dateien auf vielen anderen Plattformen (Android, iOS, Windows, ...)
summary: Schnellster Start, höchste Kompatibilität & Sicherheit, Autotype

description: Эргономика плохая , регистрировал пару новых мейлов, данные из контейнера пропали, с чем связано не знаю, удалил , явно такого происходить не должно.
